title: "An unknown error has occurred"
body:
Hoping someone can help me out with this.

For awhile now (not sure how long exactly) but I keep getting the error "An unknown error has occurred. Sorry about that. We've sent a report to the server."
I'm not sure exactly why it happens or what triggers it. Mostly it occurs right after I log in or come out of a match. It usually shows up 2 times consecutively and happens quite often. It also only happens on the Legacy Client.

I've tried power cycling my router, restarting my computer, etc. Nothing has seemed to work so far and I want to try and find out how to fix it. Not that it's preventing me from playing the game, but it's gotten quite irritating at this point.

If anyone can help me resolve this issue it would be appreciated. Thanks!!

replies.body:
This error typically pops up if your connection to the PvP.net or matchmaking platforms is fluctuating or dropping. I recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are compatible with League before we move forward with troubleshooting.

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

I've tried everything to flushing my DNS, using the Hextech Repair tool, etc. Nothing has worked for me. I've tested my connection multiple times and it doesn't seem to be dropping. I am also using a wired connection.

Anything else I can try?

We've exhausted all the steps we can without looking at your system logs. I recommend running some of those logs using our [**Hextech Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can troubleshoot this further together.

Hit me up if you run into any issues.
